name: Vitamin C 10%
used1: For Brighter, Glowing & Healthy Looking Skin
used2: A glow-boosting daily serum packaged with the goodness of Vitamin C & Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) that brightens and tones sun damaged and dull skin with dark spots
para1: Made with stabilized Vitamin C derivative "Ethyl Ascorbic Acid" that has 86% pure Vitamin C content. That is much higher than 40-50% content present in other Vitamin C derivatives. At a pH of ~4.0 it is highly stable and effective
para2: Contains 1% Acetyl Glucosamine (AG), an amino-monosaccharide (simple sugar) and a precursor of hyaluronic acid, that provides skin moisturization, boosts natural Hyaluronic Acid synthesis, and regulates natural exfoliation
para3: Boosted with Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) which are new age hydroxy acids, suitable even for sensitive skin. PHAs gently remove dead skin cells to give skin a glow. Also have antioxidant/chelation, barrier strengthening, and moisturizing effects
para4: Boosted with Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) which are new age hydroxy acids, suitable even for sensitive skin. PHAs gently remove dead skin cells to give skin a glow. Also have antioxidant/chelation, barrier strengthening, and moisturizing effects
para5: Formulated in Centella Water to soothe and heal skin
Skin concerns it targets: Dull skin · Dark spots · Uneven tone · Loss of elasticity
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: 88% subjects felt this serum improved skin radiance in 4 weeks
cp1: 90% subjects said their dark spots faded after 8 weeks
cp2: 93% subjects said skin felt healthier after 4 weeks of usage
ingred1: Not only lightens skin tone, it also promotes synthesis of Hyaluronic Acid to improve skin hydration
ingred2: They not just exfoliate gently, but also functions as humectants. Also provide protection against UV radiations

name: Niacinamide 10%
used1: For Reducing Blemishes, Acne Marks & Improving Skin Health
used2: A nourishing, daily serum packed with pure Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) and powerful antioxidant EUK-134. Together they reduce sebum, acne marks, erythema and inflammation, and also protect skin against UV-induced DNA damage
para1: Unique blend of highly effective ingredients - Niacinamide, EUK-134, Zinc and Hyaluronic Acid
para2: Pure 10% Niacinamide is clinically proven to promote protein synthesis, reduce melanin concentration & improve skin complexion in 2 weeks
para3: EUK-134 is a highly purified molecule, with potent antioxidant properties. It protects skin tissue against toxic compounds, repairs skin and reduces inflammation
para4: EUK-134 is a highly purified molecule, with potent antioxidant properties. It protects skin tissue against toxic compounds, repairs skin and reduces inflammation
para5: Lightweight serum coupled with Zinc that balances sebum activity and reduces inflammation, leaving smooth textured skin with no sticky residue
Skin concerns it targets: Acne prone skin · Blemishes / Acne marks · Oiliness
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: While Niacinamide has several skin benefits (like fading blemishes, repairing skin, etc), EUK protects the skin cells from UVB damage.
cp1: 93% subjects saw reduction in skin oiliness in 4 weeks
cp2: 93% subjects found reduction in appearance of blemishes in 8 weeks
cp3: 90% subjects found an improvement in skin texture in 6 weeks
ingred3: Aqua, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Propanediol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glyceryl Glucoside, Zinc PCA, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Pullulan, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride

name: Niacinamide 05%
used2: A nourishing & hydrating daily serum that repairs damaged barrier & soothes sensitive skin. Ideal for people with dry, sensitive skin & those who find Niacinamide 10% a little strong
para1: A lightweight, daily serum consisting of very potent Vitamin B3, Niacinamide. Especially formulated for those with dry & sensitive skin
para2: Boosted with high concentration of Bifida Ferment Lysate, which is a biotechnological active that increases cellular repair and protects against UV-induced skin damage. It also evens & brightens skin tone
para3: Oat extract has anti-inflammatory and skin-protecting properties. It repairs damaged barrier and soothes skin
para4: Oat extract has anti-inflammatory and skin-protecting properties. It repairs damaged barrier and soothes skin
para5: Boosted with Hyaluronic Acid for meeting the hydration needs of dry / dehydrated skin. As a potent humectant, it hydrates skin and makes it soft & plump
Skin concerns it targets: Damaged skin · Blemishes / Acne marks · Irritated or Sensitive skin
Suitable for: All skin types but especially suited for dry / damaged skin
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: 97% subjects said their skin irritation got reduced significantly after 4 weeks of usage
cp1: 93% subjects said skin tone looked more even & healthy after 8 weeks
cp2: 90% subjects said skin felt more healthy & less dehydrated after 3 weeks
ingred1: A probiotic ingredient that protects against UV-induced damage and reduces skin sensitivity
ingred2: Oat extract has excellent skin soothing properties and it also repairs damaged skin barrier function

name: Salicylic Acid 02%
used2: A daily gentle exfoliant with 2% salicylic acid that wards off acne, blackheads and keeps your oils in check for that flawless matt looking skin.
para1: Our high-purity salicylic acid easily penetrates the pore lining and scoops out the dirt, debris, and sebum, so skin looks clear and baby-soft
para2: Oligopeptide-10, a bioactive peptide, works synergistically with Salicylic Acid and provides potent anti-microbial activity against p-acne bacteria
para3: EGCG (an active compound found in green tea), is a powerful antioxidant and it can modulate several key pathological factors of acne, including hyperseborrhea, inflammation, and P.acnes overgrowth
para4: EGCG (an active compound found in green tea), is a powerful antioxidant and it can modulate several key pathological factors of acne, including hyperseborrhea, inflammation, and P.acnes overgrowth
para5: Formulated with White Horehound Extract which has anti-microbial & anti-inflammatory properties and it is clinically proven to reduce number of blackheads by 50% after 28 days of application
Skin concerns it targets: Acne · Oily skin · Blackheads· Skin inflammation / irritation
Suitable for: All skin types, but highly recommended for combination / oily skin
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: 90% subjects noticed visible skin clarity in 4 weeks
cp1: 93% subjects saw significant reduction in active acne in 4 weeks
cp2: 97% subjects said skin felt less oily throughout the day after using this serum for 2 weeks
ingred1: Has excellent activity against acne causing bacteria and works wonderfully well when used along with Salicylic Acid.
ingred2: A potent antioxidant (comes from green tea) that has anti-inflammatory properties. Along with Salicylic Acid, it helps soothe down irritated & inflamed skin

name: Hyaluronic + PGA 02%
used1: Intense, Multi-Level Hydration without the Oily Feel
used2: A hydrating booster with 4 different types of Hyaluronic Acid Molecules along with super hydrator Polyglutamic Acid (PGA). Provides multi-level hydration throughout the day.
para1: This fast absorbing formula contains a blend of 2 highly powerful hydrators - Hyaluronic Acid & Polyglutamic Acid. Together they provide multi-level hydration & instant plump look
para2: Contains 4 different types of Hyaluronic Acid molecules of varying molecular weight & properties for providing surface level as well as deeper hydration. The smallest molecule has molecular weight of just 6kDa (smaller the molecule, deeper its penetration in the skin)
para3: Highly concentrated Glyceryl Glucoside for stimulating the formation of Aquaporin water channels in skin cells. This in turn improves transportation of water between cells
para4: Highly concentrated Glyceryl Glucoside for stimulating the formation of Aquaporin water channels in skin cells. This in turn improves transportation of water between cells
para5: Copper Ferment improves osmose level of dermal external fluid and keeps hydration level high. Natto & Biosaccharide gum prevents TEWL (Transepidermal Water Loss)
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: 93% subjects noticed less dryness & hydrated skin in 4 weeks
cp1: 90% subjects said skin stayed hydrated throughout the day
cp2: 97% subjects felt skin felt soft & plump immediately upon application
ingred3: Aqua, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sodium Polyglutamate, Methyl Gluceth-20, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Bacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Betaine, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ethoxydiglycol

name: Granactive Retinoid 02%
used1: Formulated with new-age, bio-available, non-prescription forms of Vitamin-A. Granactive Retinoid decreases the effects of UV induced skin damage and visibly reduces fine lines & wrinkles.
para1: Specialized Retinoid molecule that results in enhanced cell proliferation, biosynthesis of extracellular proteins and glycans, and improved cellular turnover. Targeting these processes help in reversing signs of aging
para2: Boosts cell turnover & stimulates collagen production to erase fine lines and wrinkles, revealing radiant glowy skin
para3: Contains 17 amino acids along with Hyaluronic Acid to restore the damaged stratum corneum & keep skin hydrated and healthy
para4: Contains 17 amino acids along with Hyaluronic Acid to restore the damaged stratum corneum & keep skin hydrated and healthy
para5: Granactive Retinoid is sourced from Grant Industries, USA - a leading global supplier in skincare

name: Tranexamic 03%
used1: A powerful serum to effectively diminish the appearance of Melasma, PIE, PIH, and hyperpigmentation. With the power of 3% Tranexamic Acid and 1% Hydroxyphenoxy Propionic Acid which inhibits melanin transfer with great efficacy and prevents UVB damage
para1: Made with 3% Tranexamic Acid, which is a derivative of the amino acid lysine. It reduces the activity of melanocyte tyrosinase thereby treating melasma, UV-induced hyperpigmentation, and other post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation
para2: This formula further contains 3% Mandelic Acid (a type of AHA) which gently exfoliates & further reduces post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation (like acne scars)
para3: Contains 1% HPA (Hydroxyphenoxy Propionic Acid), which is proven to prevent melanogenesis better than ascorbyl glucoside, kojic acid, and arbutin. It also has equivalent efficacy to hydroquinone without cytotoxicity
para4: Contains 1% HPA (Hydroxyphenoxy Propionic Acid), which is proven to prevent melanogenesis better than ascorbyl glucoside, kojic acid, and arbutin. It also has equivalent efficacy to hydroquinone without cytotoxicity
para5: Our source for HPA is Radianskin, which is a high performance active developed by BASF, Germany

name: Salicylic + LHA  02% Face Cleanser
used1: A daily, gentle exfoliating, acne fighting face cleanser. It combines BHA + LHA (Salicylic Acid + Capryloyl Salicylic Acid) in 2% concentration, which provides deep cleansing, pore decongestion & sebum reduction without drying out the skin
para1: Contains Salicylic Acid (BHA) that penetrates deep into the skin & scoops out the dirt, debris, and sebum, hence reducing the oily look of the skin
para2: Formulated with Capryloyl Salicylic Acid (LHA), which unlike Salicylic Acid, stays on outer layer of skin and provides gentle exfoliation, revealing soft skin. The combination provides multi-level cleansing
para3: Boosted with anti-bacterial Zinc and several hydrating & soothing ingredients like Xylitylglucoside, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Allantoin, Pentyle Glycol for hydrating overall after-feel
para4: Boosted with anti-bacterial Zinc and several hydrating & soothing ingredients like Xylitylglucoside, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Allantoin, Pentyle Glycol for hydrating overall after-feel
para5: Formulated with 2 very mild sulfate-free surfactants (cleansers) that provide optimum cleaning without stripping skin lipids or proteins

name: Alpha Arbutin 02%
used1: Reduces Dark Spots, Marks & Evens Skin Tone
used2: An anti-pigmentation daily serum with high purity Alpha Arbutin along with Butylresorcinol for dramatically reducing dark spots and blemishes for brighter, even-looking skin
para1: A skin tone enhancing serum with a potent & safe skin lightening active Alpha Arbutin (9 times more effective than Beta Arbutin) that ensures even tone in 5 weeks
para2: Butylresorcinol can strongly inhibit the activity of tyrosinase, resulting in reduction of hyperpigmentation & age spots. Found to have 20 times more potent inhibitory activity than Kojic Acid in a clinical study
para3: Ferulic acid is a powerful antioxidant and can neutralize several different types of free radical. Helps in protecting & also reversing damage caused by UV rays
para4: Ferulic acid is a powerful antioxidant and can neutralize several different types of free radical. Helps in protecting & also reversing damage caused by UV rays
para5: An ultra-light formula that easily absorbs into the skin is also proven to reduce the degree of sun tanning to a great extent after UV exposure, resulting in clear, radiant skin
highlights: Fragrance free · Essential Oil Free · Non-comedogenic
Consumer study results: Alpha Arbutin and Butylresorcinol together are potent & safe tyrosinase inhibitors and reduce melanin synthesis, making them very effective for reducing hyperpigmentation.
cp1: 90% subjects noticed reduction in hyperpigmentation marks in 8 weeks
cp2: 90% subjects said skin became clear & even looking in 8 weeks
cp3: 93% subjects said it reduced sun tanning after 4 weeks of use
ingredt: Aqua, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Ethoxydiglycol, Alpha Arbutin, Lactic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Ferulic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, 4-n-Butylresorcinol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Triethanolamine, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Isoceteth-20, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Pullulan, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate

name: AHA PHA BHA 32%
used1: A powerful peeling trio of 25% AHA, 5% PHA & 2% BHA that provides multi-level exfoliation, both on the surface & inside the pores, giving you a healthy, plump, and glowing skin
para1: A whopping 25% AHA, 5% PHA & 2% BHA blend formulated at a pH of 3.4 - 3.8 for maximum effectiveness. AHA & PHA exfoliates while BHA clears congestion of pore, delivering incredible brightening & elastic feel for the baby-soft complexion
para2: PHAs are next generation AHAs. Not just an exfoliator, PHAs are also humectants and moisturizers. Further, Gluconolactone (PHA used in this formula) provides up to 50% protection against UV radiation
para3: A soothing peeling solution formulated with Turmeric Extract and Aloe juice to calm skin irritation commonly associated with peeling
para4: A soothing peeling solution formulated with Turmeric Extract and Aloe juice to calm skin irritation commonly associated with peeling
para5: All ingredients are sourced from leading global suppliers such as Fortune 500 Chemours Company, USA, and Jungbunzlauer Suisse, Canada

name: Sepicalm 03% Moisturizer
used1: A lightweight moisturizer that hydrates, soothes, and softens skin, without oily, shiny or heavy residual feel. Perfect blend of hydrators, emollients and occlusives for all day moisturization. Suitable for Normal, Acne-Prone & Sensitive Skin
para1: Formulated for Normal & Oily Skin in mind, this moisturizer is super light weight, absorbs quickly and does not give a shiny finish
para2: Sepicalm combines Amino Acids with Minerals to soothe / comfort irritated skin and calm redness caused by UVA / UVB
para3: Polyglutamic acid for skin hydration. It's a new generation hydration molecule which can hold 4 times more water than Hyaluronic Acid and reduces transepidermal water loss as well at the same time
para4: Polyglutamic acid for skin hydration. It's a new generation hydration molecule which can hold 4 times more water than Hyaluronic Acid and reduces transepidermal water loss as well at the same time
para5: Also contains Oat extract, Colloidal Oat, Squalane, Vitamin B5 and Amino acid to further nourish & calm skin

name: Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) 03% Toner
used1: A daily, gentle exfoliating, pH balancing, pore tightening & skin hydrating toner. Boosted with Pre-Biotics and Pro-Biotics to balance skin microbiome and accelerate the recovery of skin's barrier function
para1: Formulated for all skin types. This toner is very lightweight and glides on the skin effortlessly before absorbing quickly & completely
para2: PHAs are next generation AHAs. They not just exfoliate gently, but also functions as humectants. Further, Gluconolactone (PHA used in this formula) provides up to 50% protection against UV radiation
para3: Formulated with Prebiotics and Probiotics to balance skin microbiome and enhance natural defence barriers of the skin. Also boosted with multiple humectants for multi-level hydration
para4: Formulated with Prebiotics and Probiotics to balance skin microbiome and enhance natural defence barriers of the skin. Also boosted with multiple humectants for multi-level hydration
para5: High quality ingredients including Gluconolactone sourced from Jungbunzlauer, Switzerland and Prorenew Complex CLR from CLR Chemisches, Germany
